skin.title: 트위터 이모티콘
Twitter Emoji
skin.description: Twitter 가 자유로운 CC-BY 4.0 하에 사용 배포한 Noto Emoji 의 이미지 파일을 활용하였습니다. A simple library that provides standard Unicode emoji support across all platforms. Twemoji v11.0 adheres to the Unicode 11.0 spec and supports the Emoji 11.0 draft spec The Twemoji library offers support for 2,841 emojis, including skin tone and gender modifiers.

These image files are from Twitter Emoji (Twemoji), graphics licensed under CC-BY 4.0. A simple library that provides standard Unicode emoji support across all platforms. Twemoji v11.0 adheres to the Unicode 11.0 spec and supports the Emoji 11.0 draft spec The Twemoji library offers support for 2,841 emojis, including skin tone and gender modifiers.
